title: Ultimate skin
body: If DJ sona ends up being the ultimate skin, ill fucking quit this game. I think it should be a legendary if anything not the ultimate. There are about 7 other champions who deserve the ultimate more then sona.

replies.body:
Sir, you need to calm down. DJ Sona has already been confirmed to be the ultimate skin so, goodbye. Moving on though, They are making a ultimate skin for every lane. For example:
{{champion:77}} - Jungle
{{champion:81}} - ADC
{{champion:37}} - Support. 

Now we wait for the other two.

It was nice knowing you I guess. I don't know 7 other champions that deserve an ultimate skin more than Sona though. Much less 7 other champions that you could actually make a skin with enough beef to it to actually justify an Ultimate skin price tag.

> [{quoted}](name=AlexZandria,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=4FY3jcVF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-02T20:31:24.783+0000)
>
> It was nice knowing you I guess. I don't know 7 other champions that deserve an ultimate skin more than Sona though. Much less 7 other champions that you could actually make a skin with enough beef to it to actually justify an Ultimate skin price tag.

Zed, zac, kha'zix, naut, xerath, vi, and a couple others.

Definitely not most of thise. When you are picking a high cost skin you don't want to give it to a champion that doesn't have many other skins. It pigeon holes people into feeling like they need the Ultimate skin which is a really sucky thing to do to the fanbase. Sona is a lot better option than someone like Zed, Zac, or Xerath because of their limited range of skins. Naut has a new skin in the making, Vi recently got a new skin.
